Welcome to XBMC Swift’s documentation!¶

Welcome to the documentation for xbmcswift. This documentation is divided into several parts. If you are new, you should start with the Installation and then move on to Quickstart. If you would prefer a more detailed walkthrough, try the Tutorial. For a list of everything, check out the complete API reference. For more specific examples, check out Patterns.

XBMC Swift doesn’t rely on any external dependencies to get started. However, when writing plugins I like to use <http://BeautifulSoup.org>. Also, when it comes to advanced testing of plugins, I like to use <http://nosetests.org>.
